data.name: Proto-G
data.detailed_description:
Proto-G is a single player hack and slash classic that shows a conflict between brothers which involved friendly vs violent robots. Takes place in Mercurium City, a future city on earth where robotics and AI has become so advanced as an integral part of everyday life. Proto-G is a project code name for ADAM (Main Character), a genesis project that was left abandoned by his creator, because it was illegal to build a robot armed with dangerous weapons.

One day terror creeps, and Mercurium City is under attack by unidentified units of armed robots. The city was rendered powerless against those attacks, nothing can stop the terror. But there is one, He is ADAM is the only one who posses such military might to repel the assault and awaken in the middle of the desperation. So begin ADAM mission to fight the bad guys and save citizens.

In this game, you will play as ADAM and fight hard bosses in order to reveal the final culprit behind all of this terror. Discover ADAM capability as he progress on his mission and save the city!
data.about_the_game:
Proto-G is a single player hack and slash classic that shows a conflict between brothers which involved friendly vs violent robots. Takes place in Mercurium City, a future city on earth where robotics and AI has become so advanced as an integral part of everyday life. Proto-G is a project code name for ADAM (Main Character), a genesis project that was left abandoned by his creator, because it was illegal to build a robot armed with dangerous weapons.

One day terror creeps, and Mercurium City is under attack by unidentified units of armed robots. The city was rendered powerless against those attacks, nothing can stop the terror. But there is one, He is ADAM is the only one who posses such military might to repel the assault and awaken in the middle of the desperation. So begin ADAM mission to fight the bad guys and save citizens.

In this game, you will play as ADAM and fight hard bosses in order to reveal the final culprit behind all of this terror. Discover ADAM capability as he progress on his mission and save the city!
data.short_description: A sudden assault by unknown group of armed robots against peaceful Mercurium City has brought ADAM as part of Proto-G project to re-alive once more. He must fight countless dangerous foes trying to kill people and save the entire city. Embrace yourself as you uncover the evil ultimate enemy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is still an ongoing demo project. Disk space might changed in the future.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.9 Ghz
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
